newsitem.title: USA: Maxim Pharma says to expand leukemia trial.
newsitem.headline: Maxim Pharma says to expand leukemia trial.

text.p: Maxim Pharmaceuticals Inc said on Tuesday it planned seek U.S. Food and Drug Administration authorization to move into a Phase III trial of its Maxamine drug in leukemia patients.
It said it would seek permission to expand into a Phase III study in the U.S. and Europe next year.

Phase IIb clinical trial results in acute myelogenous leukemia showed Maxamine extended the duration of remission beyond the length of remission reported for patients in previously published trials using interleukin-2, the company said.
Four patients in the study discontinued therapy given the extended duration of their remission and their physician's suggestion that they may have a low probability of relapse, Maxim said.
